author: Thresher
long_description:
# Public Death Messages

This mod adds death messages for:
- Fall damage
- Fire
- Lava
- Drowning
- PVP
- Mobs
- And generally everything else

There is also a command: `/toggle_death_messages` that toggles your death messages on and off

**License**: GPLv3
name: public_death_messages
short_description: Adds toggleable and unique death messages for when a player dies
title: Public Death Messages
